casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Corey Tyrone SNEED. No. 601PA03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 21, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, John Carriker, District Attorney, for State. Daniel Shatz, Wilmington, for Sneed. Mary Price, General Counsel, for Families Against Mandatory Min. Charles E. Daye, Legal Affairs Vice President, Paul M. Green, Durham, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers

Motion by Families Against Mandatory Minimums and The North Carolina Academy of Trial Lawyers for Leave to Appear as Amici Curiae has been filed and the following order entered:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of January 2004."
